title.rendered: RHINO BAR SUIT NISSAN NAVARA D40

content.rendered:
THE NISSAN NAVARA EVOLUTION FRONT BAR IS IN AUSTRALIA

The Nissan Navara Evolution bar is now available for the Thai build vehicles. If you want to guarantee to be one of the first to receive one of these you can order now. Just give us a call on 1300 885 841 now

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing Flat Black Powder coat as standard and and can be colour coded as an option. It is a 3 and 6mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate and recovery points not offered on other brands. The mid top section comes standard in Black or can be optioned as stainless steel. We also ofer as standard, LED foglights which are also an option on many other brands.

-If your vehicle VIN number starts with MNT then our current bar is compatible.

Includes:

Standard with Winch mount

Integrated LED Foglights

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned as stainless steel

Shackles

Winch

Spotlight bar

Spotlights

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT NISSAN NAVARA D40

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
